articles.content: Daniel Craigs southern accent when he returns as detective Benoit Blanc may sound a bit different in the sequel, Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery. Partly because Craig worked on a more grounded Sout… [+1480 chars]

articles.title: I bought Princess Diana's Audi – and it changed everything - The Telegraph
